articles.title: Job scam alert! How to avoid falling victim to online fraudsters
articles.author: Fmt Reporters
articles.summary: In the first half of 2024, fraud and deceptive tactics reached unprecedented levels. Scammers are employing increasingly sophisticated methods to exploit jobseekers' aspirations. Cryptocurrency task fraud preys on individuals seeking remote work opportunities by promising payments in cryptocurrency for completing simple tasks. Money mule scams involves recruiting people to facilitate the transfer of illegally obtained funds under the guise of legitimate job opportunities. Identity theft leverages fake job postings to collect sensitive personal information from unsuspecting applicants. Online users are urged to exercise caution and protect their personal information.
